item.title: SQL basics
item.description: Introduction to SQL SQL is a very important language we used in Relational Database management system. Writing efficient SQL query can help us do lots of things. Relational model In the beginning, I would like to talk about relational model. In short, it is a table with different columns. In a more specific definition, it is an approach to managing data using a structure and language consistent with first-order predicate logic.
